p:
Moreover, it is important to highlight that some other long-term effects of COVID-19 may be described in the future and deserve attention. Viral infections in the nervous system may lead to meningoencephalitis and neuropathies as seen for herpesviruses, Zika virus, and human immunodeficiency virus (HIV).
31 , 32 , 33 Since SARS-CoV-2 infection has caused central nervous system manifestations,
34 , 35 possible consequences as neuropathic pain states may also be a possible long term manifestation of the pandemic.
